name: Female Advertising Simulator 2016 (Media Literacy Final)
description:
This is a short interactive project I made as part of a media engagement platform for a class on media literacy. The project addresses the depiction of women in advertising by placing the player on a symbolic stage to be subject to the social pressures women - and especially women in advertising - face every day.

NOTE: Some browsers are not supported. Use Chrome or Firefox for best results.

ALSO NOTE: If the web player is not working, download the .zip file below and extract the files. Use AdvertsingSim2016.exe to start.

Disclaimer: I do not own any of the music or sounds used in this project. This is intended to only be a student project.
